Name: Solaris 7

MissionSuccessStatements: You did an excellent job out there, gladiator. I see a bright future ahead of you. Continue doing what you do, and good things will happen.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You did not succeed this time, but you did your best, and this is important. It takes a lot of grit to become a real Gladiator.
BadFaithFailureStatements: You have disappointed me. Probably you are not good enough for Solaris. But that's ok. Not everyone can become a real Gladiator.
Description: Solaris VII is a terran size planet that is famous throughout the whole Inner Sphere for its BattleMech fights, which are operated there as a sport in the Solaris Games.
